item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Black Bear Saloon

Specials are a bit fuzzy right now, they have two offerings on their website:
1) 2 FOR 1 DRINKS & APPETIZERS ALL NIGHT LONG!!!
2) Join us every Monday - Thursday from 3-9PM for 2 for 1 Mugs & 4-7PM we have a $5 Appetizer Menu at the bar

The beer special seems good, unsure about the appetizer, go with it and enjoy!!!!


Your contact for this happy hour is in need of a volunteer. Please feel free to post in your RSVP if you can be our contact for the night and provide a contact phone number...THANKS BUNCHES!!!!!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
